title: Macbook Pro 2016 (late) 13" - Keyboard trouble
message:
Honestly lets just make this short:

Is there anything you can do when the spacebar keeps having double or even tripple keystrokes that does not involve replacing the whole keyboard?
Replacing the keyboards on this is so awful that I might rather just give the customer a refund then actually deal with removing every single component again

title: Macbook Pro 2016 (late) 13" - Keyboard trouble
message: Nope it’s just Apple being shitty. Not a lot you can do besides complain to Apple hopefully there’s a recall soon!
